thread.title: Kickstarter is now legally obligated to do good for society - CBS 3 Springfield
thread.title_full: Kickstarter is now legally obligated to do good for society - CBS 3 Springfield - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: CBS 3 Springfield
title: Kickstarter is now legally obligated to do good for society - CBS 3 Springfield
text:
The crowdfunding platform Kickstarter is reincorporating as a public benefit corporation, which means that it is now bound by law to make a "positive impact on society." The crowdfunding platform Kickstarter is reincorporating as a public benefit corporation, which means that it is now bound by law to make a "positive impact on society."
 CBS 3 Springfield.
